title: 7.Days.To.Die.Alpha.5.Hotfix.Steam.Edition.Cracked-3DM [32+64bit
description:
Fixed: Runaway console and browser join issues
Fixed: Input string was not in correct format console hijacking bug.
Fixed: Password popup screen to hold proper game information to connect to upon entering password.
Fixed: Game Name and Game Host max length are both now 25 characters to stop dedicated servers from having too long of a gameinfo string.
Known Issues: Some player hosted games still have incompatible NAT routers preventing other players from joining. A quick solution is try and let your friend host instead

Minimum: OS: 
WindowsXP (Service Pack 3) Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GTX | Radeon HD 4770 DirectX: Version 10 Hard Drive: 1 GB available space 
Additional Notes: Install size will gradually increase with future updates. Recommended: 
OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 | Radeon HD 5850 Network: Broadband Internet connection Installation Information 
1. Unzip 
2 run game 3DM crack has been integrated
run Install_32bit.bat or Install_64bit.bat  depending on your system
